quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Xinhua Winshare Publishing and Media Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Xinhua Winshare Publishing and Media Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Xinhua Winshare Publishing and Media Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in publishing and distribution business. The Company operates its businesses through three segments. The Publication segment is mainly engaged in publishing of publications including books, journals, audio-visual products and digital products, provision of printing services and supply of printing materials. The Distribution segment is mainly engaged in distribution of textbooks to schools, teachers and students and supply of education informatized and equipment service for secondary and primary schools, retailing, distribution and online sales of publications and others. The Others segment is mainly engaged in provision of capital operations, logistic service, advertising service and others. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic market.
